cboCostEstimates.description: As reported by the House Committee on Homeland Security on July 28, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 7778, Department of Homeland Security Seal Protection Act of 2022

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 83 (Monday, May 16, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. THOMPSON of Mississippi:
H.R. 7778.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H5009]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 348.

title: Department of Homeland Security Seal Protection Act of 2022
